mul r8.x, r6.w, cb0[9].x
mul r8.y, r6.w, cb0[10].x
mul r8.z, r6.w, cb0[11].x
mul r8.w, r6.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r9.x, r8.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r9.y, r8.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r9.z, r8.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r7.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r9.xyz

mul r0.xy, v1.xyxx, cb2[23].xyxx
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.zw, r0.xyxx, t2.zwxy, s2
add r1.x, -r0.z, r0.w
mul_sat r1.y, r1.x, cb2[22].z
mul r1.y, r1.y, r1.y
div r2.xyz, v0.xyzx, v0.zzzz
mul r3.xyz, r0.zzzz, r2.xyzx
mul r2.xyz, r0.wwww, r2.xyzx
mul r3.xyz, r3.xyzx, l(1.000000, 1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
mov r3.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r4.x, r3.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r4.y, r3.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r4.z, r3.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
mul r2.xyz, r2.xyzx, l(1.000000, 1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r5.x, r2.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r5.y, r2.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r5.z, r2.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
dp4 r0.w, r3.xyzw, cb2[7].xyzw
dp4 r1.z, r2.xyzw, cb2[7].xyzw
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.x, r0.xyxx, t0.xyzw, s0
mov r2.y, l(1.000000)
dp2 r1.w, r2.xyxx, cb0[11].zwzz
dp2 r2.x, r2.xyxx, cb0[12].zwzz
div r1.w, -r1.w, r2.x
add r0.z, -r0.z, r1.w
max r0.z, r0.z, l(0.000000)
div_sat r0.z, r0.z, r1.x
mul r0.z, r0.z, l(16.000000)
mov r4.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r2.x, r4.xyzw, cb1[39].xyzw
dp4 r2.y, r4.xyzw, cb1[40].xyzw
dp4 r2.z, r4.xyzw, cb1[41].xyzw
dp4 r2.w, r4.xyzw, cb1[42].xyzw
mov r5.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r3.x, r5.xyzw, cb1[39].xyzw
dp4 r3.y, r5.xyzw, cb1[40].xyzw
dp4 r3.z, r5.xyzw, cb1[41].xyzw
dp4 r3.w, r5.xyzw, cb1[42].xyzw
add r3.xyzw, -r2.xyzw, r3.xyzw
mul r4.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(0.062500, 0.062500, 0.062500, 0.062500)
mul r0.xy, r0.xyxx, cb2[22].xyxx
round_ni r0.xy, r0.xyxx
mul r0.xy, r0.xyxx, l(0.500000, 0.500000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
ge r1.xw, r0.xxxy, -r0.xxxy
frc r0.xy, |r0.xyxx|
movc r0.xy, r1.xwxx, r0.xyxx, -r0.xyxx
mad r0.x, r0.x, l(0.500000), r0.y
add r0.x, r0.x, l(-0.375000)
mad r2.xyzw, r0.xxxx, r4.xyzw, r2.xyzw
min r0.x, r0.w, r1.z
add r0.x, -r0.x, l(1.000000)
mul r0.x, r0.x, r0.x
mul r0.x, r0.x, r1.y
mov r4.xyz, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r1.xyzw, r2.xyzw
mov r0.y, l(0)
loop 
  itof r0.w, r0.y
  ge r4.w, r0.w, l(16.000000)
  breakc_nz r4.w
  div r5.xyz, r1.xyzx, r1.wwww
  sample_c_lz_aoffimmi_indexable(0,0,0)(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.w, r5.xyxx, t1.xxxx, s1, r5.z
  ge r0.w, r0.z, r0.w
  and r0.w, r0.w, l(0x3f800000)
  mad r4.xyz, r4.wwww, r0.wwww, r4.xyzx
  mad r1.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(0.062500, 0.062500, 0.062500, 0.062500), r1.xyzw
  iadd r0.y, r0.y, l(1)
endloop 
mul r0.xyz, r0.xxxx, r4.xyzx
mul o0.xyz, r0.xyzx, l(0.062500, 0.062500, 0.062500, 0.000000)
mov o0.w, l(1.000000)
ret
